question:
To: Zayn    Be ready for the next
competition
I put my book in your locker.
It may be very useful for you.
Do your best.
Practice makes perfect.
I wish you all the best
Keika​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Untuk: Zayn Bersiaplah untuk kompetisi berikutnya Saya menaruh buku saya di loker Anda. Ini mungkin sangat berguna untuk Anda. Lakukan yang terbaik. Latihan membuat sempurna. Aku doakan yang terbaik untukmu Keika

itu artinya

related_questions.question:
Simple present Tense (Verbal)    1. She _____ her dog everyday 
A.Feed
B.Feeds
C.To feed
D.Feeding

2. I ____ always go to the dentist 
A.are not
B.do not
C.does not
D.did not

3. When do you ____ a shower? 
A.taking
B.take
C.taken
D.took

4. Q: Do you like to sing? A: … 
A.Yes, I likes to sing
B.Yes, I like to sing
C.Yes, I am liking to sing
D.Yes, I liked to sing

5. Tom and I ____ ____ together. 
A.do surfs
B.do surfing
C.don’t surfing
D.don't surf

6. I ___ breakfast every day at 7 AM 
A.to eat
B.eat
C.eaten
D.ate

7. Q: How do you go to school? A: We ___ the bus to school 
A.riding
B.ridden
C.ride
D.rode

8. Q: When do you do your homework? A: … 
A.I did my homework at 6 PM
B.I am doing my homework at 6 PM
C.I do my homework at 6 PM
D.I have did my homework at 6 PM

9. Q: Do you enjoy playing in the park? A: … 
A.No, I don’t enjoys playing in the park
B.No, I doesn’t enjoy playing in the park
C.No, I don’t enjoy playing in the park
D.No, I no enjoy playing in the park

10. Q: Does he love his mother? A: … 
A.He love his mother
B.He to love his mother
C.He is loving his mother
D.He loves his mother​

answers.answer:
1. feeds

2. do not

3.take

4. yes, i like to sing

5. do surfing

6. i eat

7.ride

8.C.I do my homework at 6 PM

9.C.No, I don’t enjoy playing in the park

10.D.He loves his mother

Penjelasan:

simple present tense.

yang artinya masa sekarang. dalam tenses ini menggunakan verb satu dan jika subjek she he it nama orang maka verb bertambahan s

Jawaban:

OCTOGENARIAN PROTEST  

Pensioner Maude Jennings I. celebrated her eightieth birthday outside Avonhurst Town yesterday. She was one of a large group who 2. protests against the plans for a tunnel under the River Severn. Maude's tiny cottage may 3. be demolished when new roads to the tunnel 4. are built. Maude was born in the cottage, which 5. was built in the 18th century, and the entrance of the tunnel will be built at the ends of her garden. Maude /. consulted our reporter, 'I 8. have been told by the planners, and I 9. will never leave my lovely home. I 10. have lived there for eighty years!  

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan menggunakan bentuk Simple Past Tense, Simple Present Tense, Present Perfect Tense, Simple Future Tense, Modal Verbs dan Passive Voice.

Simple Past Tense:

Nominal: (+) Subject + Tobe (was/were) + Adjective

Verbal: (+) Subject + Verb-2 + Object

Passive: (+) Subject + Tobe (was/were) + Verb-3

Simple Present Tense:

Verbal: (+) Subject + Verb-1 S/ES + Object

Passive: (+) Subject + Tobe (is/am/are) + Verb-3

Present Perfect Tense

(+) Subject + Have/Has + Verb-3

Simple Future Tense:

(+) Subject + Will + Verb-1 + Object

Modal Verbs:

Active: (+) Subject + Modal Verbs (May/Will) + Verb-1 + Object

Passive: (+) Subject + Modal Verbs (May/Will) + Be + Verb-3

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
18. Wulan     : What is your plan tonight?
Arbi
: I will watch a movie at home
Wulan : What movie are you going to watch?
Arbi : I don't know yet. Perhaps I will watch drama movie.
Wulan : You should watch education movie. It's good to add our knowledge.
Arbi : It sounds good to me.
The underline sentence in the dialogue above shows the expression of....
a. asking for plan
d. giving advice
b. asking for help
e. giving information
C. asking for advice
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

a. Asking for plan.

Penjelasan:

Ini jawabannnya ya.
